name: Ace's Adventure (gokuplayer)
description:
Ace, a quiet kid growing up in a cul-de-sac, wants to gain the Courage to venture into the city. After meeting up with a man of unknown origins (Shady Guy), Ace gets the offer to leave his boring life for something more exciting. But he needs the Courage to do so!

Try downloading the Unity EXE zip if the web version is broken!

===Known Bugs===

UI does not work in the browser

Jumping is clunky
